snippet: A federal appellate court offered important reasoning behind its decision to strike down same-sex marriage bans in Wisconsin and Indiana.
abstract: Editorial underscores importance of clarity and blunt reasoning behind federal appeals court ruling declaring same-sex marriage bans in Wisconsin and Indiana unconstitutional; urges Supreme Court to review pro-marriage-equality rulings from Fourth and Tenth Circuits.
lead_paragraph: A federal appellate court offered important reasoning behind its decision to strike down same-sex marriage bans in Wisconsin and Indiana.
